title: Tech softball splits with Indiana State and Chattanooga - Tennessee Tech
content: Tech softball splits with Indiana State and Chattanooga  Tennessee Tech
description:
CHATTANOOGA, Tenn. â€“ After a tough-luck outing against Indiana State, the Tennessee Tech softball team bounced back to earn a split on Saturday in the Chattanooga Challenge.

Tech fell 3-2 to the Sycamores in the early game, then scratched out a 4-1 victory against host Chattanooga at Frost Stadium.

The Golden Eagles (7-2) return to action on Sunday to close out the tournament with a 12:30 contest against Radford.
